opis: Prekrasna kuća prizemnica sa bazenom u Novigradu na lijepoj mirnoj lokaciji samo 1 km od centra grada i svih sadržaja i 1 km od plaža.Kuća je građena 2019 god. Kvalitetne građe .Površina stambenog prostora je 92 m2 gdje je jako lijep raspored u kojem je smještena kuhinja ,dnevna soba i blagovaona otvorenog tima ,zatim 2 velike lijepe prostrane sobe , kupaonica i hodnik Na podu je po svuda kvalitetna keramika.Kuća ima veliku terasu za druženje i odmor .Namještaj je nov i kvalitetan i kuća se prodaje namještena .Ima klima za grijanje i hlađenje.U dvorištu koje je 290 m2 se nalazi bazen za uzivanje a dvorište je lijepo uređeno i ograđeno .Ima garažu za spremanje alata ,ležaljki i ostale stvari .Dokumentacija je sva sređena i čisto vlasništvo --- Beautiful single-storey house with a swimming pool in Novigrad in a beautiful quiet location just 1 km from the city center and all amenities and 1 km from the beach. The house was built in 2019. Quality materials. The living space area is 92 m2 with a very nice layout that includes a kitchen, living room and open-plan dining room, then 2 large, beautiful spacious bedrooms, a bathroom and a hallway. There is quality ceramics on the floor everywhere. The house has a large terrace for socializing and relaxing. The furniture is new and high-quality and the house is being sold furnished. It has air conditioning for heating and cooling. In the yard, which is 290 m2, there is a swimming pool for enjoyment and the yard is beautifully landscaped and fenced. It has a garage for storing tools, sun loungers and other things. All documentation is in order and the ownership is clear
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
